original_title: Ringo Starr and His All Starr Band Live at the Greek Theater
overview: Ringo Starr and His 10th All Starr Band perform their final show at the Greek Theatre in Los Angeles, California in August 2008. Surrounded by stars, they play an exuberant set including both Beatles classics and solo hits. Songs include: 'It Don't Come Easy', 'Photograph', 'Yellow Submarine' and 'A Little Help from My Friends'.
title: Ringo Starr and His All Starr Band Live at the Greek Theater
